Source.Name: uclogic-tools
Source.Summary: Uclogic-tools is a collection of programs for collecting and analyzing diagnostic information from UC-Logic graphics tablets (rebranded as Huion, Yiynova, Ugee, Monoprice, Turcom and others).
Source.Description: Uclogic-tools is a collection of programs for collecting and analyzing diagnostic information from UC-Logic graphics tablets (rebranded as Huion, Yiynova, Ugee, Monoprice, Turcom and others).
